name: jgpt
description: jgpt (Javascript GPT) is a lightweight and flexible library designed to integrate OpenAI's GPT models into JavaScript applications. It provides a simple interface for sending prompts to GPT models and retrieving their responses, all wrapped within a clean and easy-to-use class structure. Whether you want to convert data into different formats, generate creative content, or any other text-based task, jgpt allows developers to leverage the power of GPT within their JavaScript projects, making AI-driven operations more accessible and efficient.
author: 401-Nick
